channel.title: GCP Notes on Ricky
channel.description: Recent content in GCP Notes on Ricky

item.title: GCP Command
item.description: monitoring # list gcloud alpha monitoring policies list --project="project-prod-a" >project-prod-a.yaml # update gcloud alpha monitoring policies update --policy-from-file="project-prod-a.yaml" "project-prod-a" cloud storage # Create bucket gsutil mb -c standard -l asia-east2 gs://prod-a gsutil iam ch allUsers:objectViewer gs://prod-a # Upload files gsutil -m rsync -x ".svn/" -u -d -r srcDir gs://prod-a gsutil -m cp downloads/*.csv gs://prod-a/data/ # Create CORS file cat << EOF > /data/cors.json [ { "origin": ["*"], "responseHeader": ["Access-Control-Allow-Origin"], "method": ["GET","HEAD","DELETE"], "maxAgeSeconds": 3600 } ] EOF # Set CORS gsutil cors set /data/cors.
